metadata.title: CVE-2020-13666 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Drupal Core. Drupal AJAX API does notdisable JSONP by default, allowing for an XSS attack. This issue affects:Drupal Drupal Core 7.x versions prior to 7.73; 8.8.x versions prior to8.8.10; 8.9.x versions prior to 8.9.6; 9.0.x versions prior to 9.0.6.

criterions.comment: drupal7 package in xenial is affected and needs fixing.
